product.name: MiGoals Plus
product.shortDescription: Get this affordable account that takes care of your everyday banking needs and add more benefits when you need them.

features.name: My Pocket
features.description: Get a free budgeting and savings pocket linked to your Nedbank current account to earn interest and get instant access to your money when you need it.

features.name: eNotes
features.description: Keep track of your finances with the eNotes SMS notifications, anytime, anywhere. eNotes keeps you informed about all transactions on your account.

features.name: No Funds Alert Services
features.description: No funds alert is a service that provides a delay of the transactions being returned,due to insufficient funds in the account. Helping you save on unnecessary dishonoured penalty fees.

features.name: Salary Switching
features.description: Our free salary switching service will provide you with a confirmation of banking details to take to your employer for a quicker and simpler switch. Your overdraft will activate once your first salary is deplosited.

features.name: Debit Order Switching
features.description: If this is going to be your main account, we can, where possible, help you move your debit orders to your new Nedbank account for free,or you can download the MoneyApp and do it yourself.

salesHighlights.question: Can I use my card at toll gates?
Can I do online transactions?
salesHighlights.answer: Yes, you can do local and international online transactions.

salesHighlights.question: Will my card be delivered or do I need to collect it?
When will my card be available?

features.name: Greenbacks Rewards Membership
features.description: Nedbank Greenback member, you can earn Nedbank Greenbacks on all your eligible card spend*, which you can then redeem for a variety of exciting rewards.

productAttributes.attributeName: 1 Months Pay Slips|N/A|CLIENT|PROOFOFINCOME|PAYSLIP|1 Months Pay Slips

features.name: Nedbank Insurance Funeral Plan
features.description: The Nedbank Insurance Funeral Plan provides cover that will help you to secure a dignified funeral for yourself or your family members. If you choose this option, we'll get in touch with you to finalise the sale.

features.name: Free Cash withdrawal at participating Retailers
features.shortDescription: Free Cash withdrawal at participating Retailers

features.name: Amex Card
features.description: Accelerate your Greenbacks rewards with the Amex Card
